body.name: PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Cubic Zirconia Cuff Earrings Huggie Stud
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 22 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: A Hollywood favorite, huggies are one of the biggest jewelry trends right now! At just 12mm (0.47 inches) in diameter, our white gold and premium AAAAA cubic zirconia earrings are perfect for every day and night wear, and can also be worn in a second hole.
These stunning earrings are plated in Rhodium with a stainless steel post to ensure a long lasting finish that is nickel free, lead free, and hypoallergenic.

✦ 60-DAY GUARANTEE ✦ Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 60-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us - a member of our team will be happy to help you.

✦ SUSTAINABILITY ✦ PAVOI is dedicated to sustainability throughout our entire product cycle. Our jewelry is made from 100% recycled materials and we package in 99% recycled materials. We work to reduce our carbon emissions and offset plastic consumption by removing 275,000 bottles from oceans annually. We are committed to maintain a balanced and eco-friendly business that minimizes our environmental impact. Trust that PAVOI is continuously working towards a greener future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We LOVE these earrings!!
reviews.reviewText: LONG REVIEW! I'll start by saying these earrings are exactly what I was looking for. I purchased a set for myself quite a while back, and they're really cute for adult women as "huggie", or just small hoop earrings. But, after receiving my pair and wearing them for a while to test their durability, I thought they would be a perfect set of small hoops for my 6 y/o daughter. And I was definitely right! As you can see in the picture, I got the rose gold plated for her, and they're absolutely adorable! They're a perfect size so you can tell she is wearing little hoops, but still small enough to suit her small frame and be manageable. They're very lightweight so they don't pull on her ears at all. However, the best feature of these earrings is probably the ease of wearing them. With a lot of hoops for little girls, the closure on them is the type where the 'post' part that goes through the ear has to go back inside the earring (like the earring is hollow) itself to be secured. These types of closures always end up with my daughters ear getting pinched because it's so hard to maneuver to close. Other hoops will simply have the post clip on the top of the back side of the earring, with a little piece sticking out. The piece you 'pop' in and out when you're putting them in or removing them. These don't pinch her ears, but that piece sticking off the back always gets caught on something and the earring falls out without anyone noticing. We have 2 seperate sets of hoops that were made this way, and both sets have one earring missing because they inevitably came out and got lost, never to be seen again. So, that leads me to why these are so great, again.. The closure on these is fantastic. The earring has a hinge in the middle which essentially let's in fold down to seperate almost in half, then the post goes through the ear and you bring the other half back up and the post clicks right in to the other half of the earring. There is NOTHING sticking out/off the back side, so it doesn't get caught on anything and become unsecured. It never pinches my daughters ear, and it's super easy to close and open. My daughter sleeps in her earrings, and these have never come open or gotten lost in the night like the others did. I genuinely can't say enough good things about these earrings. They haven't tarnished or turned, and they're a great value for an excellent price. I highly recommend!! For adults, or kids!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sleeping in!
reviews.reviewText: First off, I love this brand! I found them on amazon a couple years ago. I know their jewelry is well made and lasts! I got these earrings to wear everyday, even while sleeping. If you are reading this review looking for earrings comfy enough to sleep in, I think these will be for you! My “comfy earrings” (that’s the brand name) finally started looking not so cute. I was looking for comfortable earrings to sleep in and wear every day. These are cute for any occasion- dressy or casual. They are classy and cute. They are small! What small is varies from person to person, but to me they are small. For those who are shocked by the small size, you may want to do your research before ordering. You can see in the description the size of the earrings and also look at other customers picture reviews. On me, they have a little space between the bottom of my lobe and the bottom of the earring. In other words they don’t hug against the bottom of my earlobe. It all depends on the size of your ears and ear lobes. If you have large earlobes or ears, I suppose you may not be able to close them? I don't know, I don’t have that issue at all. I have seen another reviewer have that issue though. It’s something to take note of. Anyways, they are so comfy I don’t even feel them in my ears. I can shower and sleep with them in no problem. I’ll probably order more colors! I think these would also be great for kids, toddlers or babies. I’m ordering a pair for my toddler! I will update if I have any issues. The only thing I am worried about is that these could possibly fall out. Not that they don’t feel secure, but I am used to screw back earrings. So far they are fine though. If you were worried about that, you could always put one of those little tiny clear plastic earring backs on. Like the kind that come on earrings behind the earring back to hold the earrings on the packaging. I personally have enough space for one of those little clear plastic earring backs (the tiny ones) to fit in the earring and still close it. I’ll probably do that to the ones I order for my toddler, just in case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite earrings!
reviews.reviewText: I have worn these literally every day since purchasing… I do take them out to shower and sleep. They are amazing quality and look so much more expensive than what they are. Super cute and go with absolutely everything
Great quality, very pretty, and so inexpensive! I have reactions to cheap metals in my ears and no reactions what so ever!
I loved them. They look so expensive. The quality is perfect.
Muy bonitos y llegaron de acuerdo a o lo que anunciaban. Solo revisar que si son pequeños, en la imagen da la impresión de que son más grandes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have had these for about 4 months now and they are still golden and not one bit of grey in sight! They are super easy to adjust and put on which is great and they look sooo nice! Definitely worth the price and you can literally where them with anything they are so cute
